outputs.output_descr: to establish  the sustablity of isoparaffin and siloxane (KC-6) technology as a variable replacement to HCFC-141b technology for cleaning in Solvent  Sector and to reduce 3.1 ODP tones of HCFC

project_descr: Demonstration project for conversion from HCFC-141b-based technology to iso-paraffin and siloxane (KC-6) technology for cleaning in the manufacture of medical devices at Zhejiang Kindly Medical Devices Co. Ltd.
project_title: Demonstration project in solvent sector-Zhejiaing Kindly
